title: Capstone work during 7th sem
content: I'm a student of CSE (EC campus), and I heard that we will need to frequently travel to RR campus for placement-related activities during 7th sem. So I'm thinking I will stay closer to RR campus in my relative's house. Will I need to visit EC campus every week (or more)? What about during summer? Will this depend on my guide?

comments.body: It is a bit dependent on your guide. I didn't have to travel too much for capstone. I went only for reviews.
